EmailTemplate.subject: We appreciate your participation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
It’s been a pleasure working with you. Thank you for taking the time to determine the best ways to increase the impact of your Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c} award.
Next steps:
Invoice: You will receive an invoice for the items you purchased by the next business day following your order.
Submitting profile materials: You will receive an email within the next week with instructions on how to submit your profile text and photo.
Marketing tools: Please note that marketing tools are delivered by the 15th of the magazine publication month.
Here’s a link to the Ad Guidelines for you to follow: {!Market__c.Product_Overview_Ad_Guidelines__c}
The best part of my job is working with great people like you and I’m excited to see the results of our efforts. As always, please feel free to contact me with any questions. Thank you for your time and partnership throughout the process.
Please note: Only Five Star Professional can name you a Five Star award winner. Five Star Professional is the only approved provider of official plaques and other products related to your award. Trophy companies and other online vendors do not comply with industry regulatory requirements or firm compliance requirements and may be violating trademarks or copyrights.
